property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, display this barrier next to the location deck. You may not move or be moved from this location while this barrier is next to it. When this location has no other cards, banish this card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, display this barrier next to your character card. At the start of each of your turns, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 7 check to banish this card; otherwise, bury the top card of your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The diffculty to defeat this barrier is increased by the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any. Each character at your location encounters this barrier. Each character that does not defeat this barrier takes 2 Combat damage that may not be reduced. If any character defeates this barrier, it is defeated; the character with the highest result (you choose in case of a tie) may add a plunder card from the box to his hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, you are dealt 1d4+1 Combat damage, and each other character at your location is dealt 1 Combat damage; then recharge your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this barrier next to the location deck. If you start your turn at this location, roll 1d6. On a 6, banish this barrier. On any other result, your ship is dealt that amount of Structural damage; move this barrier faceup next to a random location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If undefeated, Knuckles Grype deals no damage; banish an armor or bury the top 1d4+1 cards of your deck. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Scurvy Zombie is immune to the Fire, Mental, and Poison traits. Halve the damage dealt by the Scurvy Zombie (rounding up). If undefeated, each other character at your location summons and encounters a Scurvy Zombie. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Damage dealt by the Sea Devil is increased by 2. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Ancient Mariner is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. If undefeated, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 9 check or bury the top 1d4 cards of your deck. If defeated, you may immediately attempt to close the location this henchman came from.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Bull Shark may not be evaded. Before you act, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 9 check or the Bull Shark deals 1d4 damage to you.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Canopy Creeper is immune to the Electricity, Mental, and Poison traits. If the check to defeat has the Cold or Slashing trait, add 1d8 to it. Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 10 check or the difficulty of the check to defeat the Canopy Creeper is increased by 3.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Giant Wasp is immune to the Mental trait. After you act, the Giant Wasp deals 1 Poison damage to you.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If the check to defeat has the Piercing or Slashing trait, add 1d8 to it. All damage from the Jellyfish Swarm is Poison damage. If you do not defeat the Jellyfish Swarm by at least 4, shuffle it into the deck it came from; the Jellyfish Swarm still counts as defeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Nirento is immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Before you act, succeed at a Wisdom 8 check or you may not use spells that have the Attack trait or weapons. If the check to defeat has the Bludgeoning trait, the difficulty of the check to defeat is increased by 4.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, the Port Peril Corsair deals 1d4-1 Combat damage to you. If the check to defeat does not include the Swashbuckling trait, the difficulty of the check to defeat is increased by twice the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, display a random ally, if you have any. If defeated, and the check to defeat had the Swashbuckling trait, return the displayed ally to your hand; otherwise, bury it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, display an ally that has the Animal trait, if you have any. If defeated, return the ally to your hand; if undefeated, banish the ally.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: The Sea Scourge is immune to the Acid, Mental, and Poison traits. Before you act, each character at your location must succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 8 check or be dealt 2 Acid damage.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "What have we here? Fish out of water? Marines! Show these dogs what Cheliax does to pirates!" -Commander Kyan Kain

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, recharge a card, then summon and encounter the ship Dominator. You may not play boons that have the Pirate or Swashbuckling trait on the check to defeat this villain. If undefeated, discard as many cards from the blessings deck as there are closed locations.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "Put your backs into it, you sons of dogs! There may be no honor among thieves, but they'll not take our prize from us today!" -Free Captain Gortus Svard

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, recharge a card. Then summon and encounter the ship Devil's Pallor. If you are the only character at your location, the difficulty of the check to defeat the villain is increased by 1d6.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "See this tattoo here? I had it done after I gutted the last pirate who tried to get his hands on my map." -Isabella Locke

property.name: Attr1
property.value: All damage from Isabella "Inkskin" Locke is Acid damage. Before you act, recharge a card, then summon and encounter the ship Thresher. After you act, Isabella deals you 1 Acid damage.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "The treasure of Mancatcher Cove belongs to me!" -Krelloort

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, if there are other cards in the location deck, put Krelloort on the bottom of the location deck, then summon and encounter the villain Sea Devil Prince. If you fail a check to defeat Krelloort, discard your hand.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: "I smell your blood in the water, shorwalkers! Time to bleed some more!" -Sea Devil Prince

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, another character at your location must summon and encounter the henchman Sea Devil. If you would fail a check to defeat the Sea Devil Prince, the damage dealt by the Sea Devil Prince is increased by 5.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Damage dealt by The Matron is dealt to each character at your location. Before you act, another character at your location must summon and encounter the henchman Sea Devil. If defeated, banish The Matron and shuffle the villain Krelloort into the location deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Whalebone Pilk in immune to the Mental and Poison traits. Before you act, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 8 check or bury 1d4 cards from the top of your deck. Then summon and encounter the ship Deathknell. If Whalebone Pilk is not the only card in a location deck, he is undefeated.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card and another card to succeed at your check to acquire an ally that has the Pirate trait. Discard this card to explore your location. Add the Swashbuckling trait to your non-combat checks during this exploration.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you would fail a check by 4 or less, you may discard this card to ignore the result and reroll the dice. You must take the second result. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to recharge an ally that has the Aristocrat trait from your discard pile. Discard this card to explore your location. Add the Swashbuckling trait to your combat checks during this exploration.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic Elite

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If you are the only character at your location, you may reveal this card to add 1 to your combat check. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with light armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Light Armor Magic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to reduce Combat damage to you by 2, or to add 1 die to your Acrobatics check. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with light armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with light armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: After you are dealt damage from a bane, reveal this card to draw any number of cards up to the number you discarded in damage.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to any check. Discard this card to add 2 dice to any check attempted by a character on a ship. Discard this card to explore your location. After you play this card, if it matches the top card of the blessings discard pile, recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to your ship. While displayed, reduce Structural damage dealt to your ship by 1. Discard this card if your ship is banished. If your ship is banished because you seized a ship, you may bury a card to display this card next to your new ship.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to add 1d8 and the Slashing trait to any combat check attempted by a character at your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to succeed at your Constitution or Fortitude check to defeat a bane with the Aquatic trait. Discard this card to add 1d6 and the Electricity trait to defeat a monster with the Aquatic trait. After playing this card, succeed at a Wisdom or Survival 7 check to recharge it instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to your ship. While displayed, add 1d6 to your checks to defeat ships.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, banish this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 2d8. You may additionally discard another card to add your Craft skill; after playing that card, succeed at a Craft 13 check to recharge that card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1d6 to your Perception check. Discard this card to examine the bottom 2 cards of your location deck and put them back in any order. After playing this card, reveal a card that has the Swashbuckling trait to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, bury this card to roll 1d6, plus a number of additional d6 equal to the adventure deck number of the current scenario, if any; you may additionally discard a spell to add your Arcane or Divine skill. After playing this card, succeed at an Arcane or Divine 10 check to recharge this card instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1d8 and the Swashbuckling trait to your Survival check. Discard this card to succeed at your Survival check. After playing this card, succeed at a Survival 9 check to recharge this card instead of burying it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 2d4+2; you may additionally discard this card to add another 2d4. If the bane is a monster that has the Aquatic trait, you may reroll 1 die; you must take the second result. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Heavy Armor Magic Aquatic

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 3, or Structural damage dealt to your ship by 1. Banish this card to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0; if you are proficient with heavy armors, bury this card instead. If you are proficient with heavy armors, you may recharge this card when you reset your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to add 1d6 to your Perception check. Discard this card to examine the top 2 cards of any location deck and put them back in any order. Reveal a card that has the Pirate trait to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Reveal this card to recharge any number of cards and add 2 to your combat check for each card you recharged.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Bury this card to repair your ship. Discard this card to add 1d10 to a Craft check. Discard this card to explore your location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Recharge this card to examine the top card of the location deck. Discard this card to add 1d4+2 to any check attempted by a character on a ship; if the top card of the blessings discard pile is Blessing of the Gods, add 1d8+2 instead. After you play this card, succeed at a Survival 9 check to recharge it instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to add 1 die to a check to defeat a monster that has the Aquatic trait attempted by a character at your location, or 2 dice if the monster has the Merfolk trait. Bury this card to draw 1 random item from the box and add it to your hand.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to play a weapon that specifies a skill to use for a check; use your Arcane or Divine skill in place of that skill. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane or Divine 10 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card. While this card is displayed, for your combat check, you may use your Arcane or Divine skill + 1d6; you may additionally discard this card to add another 2d6. At the end of your turn, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish this card; otherwise, attempt an Arcane or Divine 11 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to use your Arcane skill + 2d6, or 2d12 if the bane has the Aquatic trait. After playing this card, if you do not have the Arcane skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane 11 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, discard this card to use your Arcane or Divine skill + 2d6. After playing this card, if you do not have either the Arcane or Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at an Arcane or Divine 10 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Discard this card to reduce damage dealt to another character at your location by any amount. You are dealt Combat damage equal to half the amount reduced (rounded up). After playing this card, if you do not have the Divine skill, banish it; otherwise, you may succeed at a Divine 8 check to recharge this card instead of discarding it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display this card next to a closed location. While a character is at that location, instead of the first exploration of his turn, he may recharge 1d4+1 random cards from his discard pile. At the start of your turn, if ou do not have the Arcane skill, banish this card, otherwise, attempt an Arcane 10 check. If you succeed, recharge this card; if you fail, discard it.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d6+1; you may additionally bury this card to add another 1d8. If you did not bury this card, roll 1d6, or 1d12 if you are proficient with weapons; on a 1, shuffle this card into your deck. When playing another weapon, you may discard this card to add 1d4 to the combat check.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d6+1; you may additionally bury this card to add another 2d6. If you did not bury this card, roll 1d6, or 1d12 if you are proficient with weapons; on a 1, shuffle this card into your deck. Recharge this card to add 1d6 and this card's traits to another character's combat check at this location.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 2d4+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 2d4. If you aren't proficient with weapons, the difficulty of this check is increased by 4. If any d4 rolled on this check is a 4, count it as a 6.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d4. You may play this card as if it has the Bludgeoning trait instead of the Piercing trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d10+1; you may additionally bury this card to add another 1d10. If you did not bury this card, roll 1d6, or 1d12 if you are proficient with weapons; on a 1, shuffle this card into your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d6+1. Add another 1d8 if the bane has the Aquatic trait. If you are proficient with weapons, and you fail a combat check when playing this weapon against a non-villain monster, you may put the monster on the top or bottom of the location deck, if it came from one.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Dexterity or Ranged skill + 1d10+1; you may additionally bury this card to add another 3d6 and the Poison trait. If you did not bury this card, roll 1d6, or 1d12 if you are proficient with weapons; on a 1, shuffle this card into your deck.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill + 1d8+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d8.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: For your combat check, reveal this card to use your Strength or Melee skill +1d8+1; you may additionally discard this card to add another 1d8. Add another 1d8 if the bane has the Human trait.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 2 Weapon 1 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 2 Ally 2 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: If you acquire a card during your exploration, you may discard it to immediately explore again.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Charisma or Diplomacy 8 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: No effect.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: Even in the Shackles, a few people try to wrest an honest living from the sea. These delusional sorts rarely last for long. Rather, the most successful Shackles fisherfolk know how to find, defend, and usuerp the best fishing spots, how to pass mackerel off as salmon, and tricks for dying pink meat white. They also know when it's time to follow migrating fish to more favorable waters.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 3 Barrier 2 Weapon 2 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 1 Ally 1 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 6 check or bury 1 card.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Summon and defeat the henchman Sea Devill

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 6 check or bury 1 card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: This underwater sinkhole-or blue hole-plunges deep beneath the waves and seafloor alike. The cove is a perfect spot for treasures and bodies meant to remain lost.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: At the start of your turn, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 6 check or bury 1 card.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 1 Barrier 3 Weapon 1 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 1 Ally 3 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: You may reveal an ally that has the Aristocrat or Captain trait to add 1d4 to your check.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Charisma or Diplomacy 9 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, recharge a card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: This fortified tower stares from the slopes of Windward Isle, watching the surrounding seas for foes. A true pirate fort, the Rock has passed between many hands since its construction, but it's now the home of Lady Agasta Smythee. The former wife of Captain "Iron Bert" Smythee, Agasta has proven herself a stern commander. None have dared cross the widow since her husband's death.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Monster 2 Barrier 2 Weapon 2 Spell 0 Armor 0 Item 2 Ally 1 Blessing 0

property.name: Attr2
property.value: If you move here, you may draw a card.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Succeed at a Wisdom or Perception 7 check.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: On closing, draw a card.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The violent waves, rough stone, and debris-strewn sands of this rugged isle make it a natural sea fortress. Rising from the island's already formidable cliffs, the stoic walls of Tidewater Rock intimidate any would-be intruders.

property.name: Attr4
property.value: If you start your turn at this location, draw a card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 7

property.name: Attr1
property.value: You may discard a card that has the Divine trait to add 3 to your check to defeat the Deathknell.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: You may discard a card from the blessings deck to add 1d12 to your check against a monster. If your character would die, draw a number of cards from your discard pile equal to your hand size and bury all your other cards.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 7

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The Magnimarian whaler is doomed to wander the seas. Brimming with zombies and spirits, Whalebone Pilk's ghost ship will rise from the deep to torment the living until its bell is unrung.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, succeed at a Wisdom or Divine 7 check or bury 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 2

property.name: Attr1
property.value: If defeated, discard a card. Do not roll for the plunder card type; stash a random weapon instead.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reduce Structural damage to this ship by 1. You may discard a card from the blessings deck to add 1d12 to your check to acquire a boon, or 2d12 if the boon is a spell that has the Attack trait or a weapon.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 2

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A Shackles drekar of ill repute, the Devil's Pallor aims its ballistae at the innocent. The hobgoblin captain Gortus Svard commands it toward depravity, mischief, and destruction.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, succeed at a Constitution or Fortitude 6 check or bury 1 card.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 2

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Before you act, bury a random card from your discard pile.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Reduce Structural damage to this ship by 1. At the start of your turn, you may discard a card from the blessings deck to recharge any number of cards and draw that number of cards.

property.name: Traits
property.value: Class 2

property.name: Flavour
property.value: A junk of the Dragon Empires, Inkskin's ship is home to human and sea devil raiders alike. If you see the Thresher, look behind you--longboats full of buccaneers are already boarding your vessel.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: At the start of your turn, summon and encounter the henchman Hammerhead Shark.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: As if the raiders above the waves weren't bad enough, raiders from beneath burst from the seas, seeking revenge against any who invade their aquatic domain. Give the brine-sucking sea devil rabble a reason to think twice before returning to the docks at Rickety's Squibs!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Merchant Marina Fishing Village Seaside Warehouse Docks Chapel Safe House Alehouse Harbor

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Your ship is anchored at the Merchant Marina.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you encounter a monster with the Merfolk trait, draw a random ally from the box and set it aside. If you defeat the monster, put the ally in your hand; if undefeated, banish the ally. You may add the total of the adventure deck numbers of the allies in your hand, if any, to your check to defeat a monster with the Merfolk trait.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Sea Devil Prince

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Sea Devils

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a skill feat. Loot: Rickety Hake, Totem Necklace

property.name: Flavour
property.value: The Sargavan trader ship Sea Chanty is under attack by the pirates of the Devil's Pallor! With merchants weakened and buccaneers distracted, it's the perfect time to claim the plunder aboard both vessels as your own!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Lonely Island Holy Isle Shark Island Pinnacle Atoll Tidewater Rock Tempest Cay Floating Shipyard Windward Isle

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Display the ships Sea Chanty and Devil's Pallor next to this card. Put a number of plunder cards under the Sea Chanty equal to 14 minus the number of locations. After your move step, move these two ships to random open locations. If they are at the same location at the end of the turn, banish 1 plunder card from the Sea Chanty. When you would encounter a ship, instead move the Devil's Pallor to your location and encounter it.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Gortus Svard

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Enemy Ships

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Gain all the plunder cards under the Sea Chanty.

property.name: Flavour
property.value: To gain the favor of Agasta Smythee, the Lady of Tidewater Rock, you must prove yourselves pirates worthy of the name by engaging other ships on the high seas. But watch out for the Chelish man-o'-war Dominator and the diabolical pirate hunter Commander Kyan Kain!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Windward Isle Pinnacle Atoll Tidewater Rock Coastline Fog Bank Raker Shoals Tempest Cay Fringes of the Eye

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When you defeat an Enemy Ship henchman, automatically close its location. Then randomly choose a location; if it is closed, summon and encounter the villain Commander Kyan Kain. To win this scenario, the number of plunder cards must exceed the number of locations.

property.name: Attr3
property.value: 1 Enemy Ship per Location

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Buccaneer's Breastplate, Farglass, Lady Agasta Smythee

property.name: Flavour
property.value: An ally of sea devils, the pirate Isabella "Inkskin" Locke is as infamous for her brutality as she is for her tattoo-covered skin. A map numbers among her more elaborate tattoos, one that shows the way to the treasure of Mancatcher Cove. Find Isabella and hunt down the treasure!

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Coastline Harbor Beach Mangrove Swamp Sea Caves Jungle Fishing Village

property.name: Attr1
property.value: When Isabella "Inkskin" Locke is banished, summon and build the location Mancatcher Cove. Shuffle the villain The Matron into Mancatcher Cove. To win the scenario, you must defeat the villain Krellort.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Isabella "Inkskin" Locke

property.name: Attr3
property.value: Knuckles Grype Buccaneers

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Loot: Brine's Sting, Svingli's Eye

property.name: Flavour
property.value: In the day's waning hours, a battered vessel appears against a bloody sunset. Its name comes into view across a worm-eaten bow; Deathknell. Fend off the spectral ghost ship. Destroy its undead boarding party before they seize new souls for their crew of the damned.

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Scar Bay Fog Bank

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Add 2 allies per player to the Fog Bank. Add 2 monsters per player to Scar Bay. Shuffle the villain and henchmen into a stack; shuffle half (rounded up) into Scar Bay and the rest into the Fog Bank. You may not temporarily or permanently close a location that has cards.

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Whalebone Pilk

property.name: Attr3
property.value: The Ancient Mariner 1 Scurvy Zombie per Character

property.name: Attr4
property.value: Each character gains a power feat.

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Adventure Path

property.name: Flavour
property.value: With a ship to command and a semi-loyal crew, you're ready to gain a reputation alongside the Shackles' most daring pirates. Learn the ways of a true buccaneer by preying on merchant ships, avoiding the vengeful hand of pirate-hunters, and searching for lost treasure. Of course, no one makes a name for themselves in the Shackles without getting their hands dirty. Sea monsters and aquatic raiders are among the least of a new captain's concerns when there are other pirates eager to end your legend before it's even begun!

property.name: Subtype
property.value: Adventure Path

property.name: Attr1
property.value: Give the Devil His Due The Toll of the Bell Attack on Rickety's Squibs The Lady's Favor The Secret of Mancatcher Cove

property.name: Attr2
property.value: Each character gains a card feat. Gain a Class 2 ship feat.
